title: Unspecified Error occurred, please check logs for more information
body: So every time I try to open up League of Legends a message pops up that says "Unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information." What is going on?

replies.body: The unspecified error you're receiving may be due to a few reasons depending on when during the patcher process it's happening.  Your specific issue might be a result of a permissions issue with your settings blocking the patcher from scanning game files.  As a first step, I recommend going over the instructions in our [Permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide to troubleshoot.  Hit me up if you continue to have issues with this, as well as any additional information such as the % the error is occurring.

When I first go to open up the program, just by double clicking on it, that error message pops up. When I run the program as administrator it will open and load up to about 27% or 33% and then that message will pop up again. 

I have followed all of the instructions that you had posted and it is still going on. 

I am running HP notebook with Windows 10 2gb of ram
